ComicInfo.Title: The Plague Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
For centuries, they have shaped the progress of New York City from the shadows. Their legacy is cloaked in mystery, with even the most connected in Manhattan unaware of what they truly represent. But now, the Cabal has released a deadly plague upon New York City, and Marian's life is on the line.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Emilio Laiso & Wes Hartman | 1 | B | Cover B | Tony Brescini & Leonardo Paciarotti | 2 | C | Cover C | Richard Ortiz & Ylenia Dinapoli | 3 | D | Atlantic City Boardwalk Con Exclusive Cover, Limited to 350 | Jamie Tyndall (a) & Ula Mos & c) | 4 |
